ComicInfo.Title: Shattered Grid Prelude
ComicInfo.Summary:
With Rita’s plan throwing chaos into the personal lives of the Power Rangers, Billy faces a difficult choice…
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Dan Mora | 1 | B | Cover B | Miguel Mercado | 3 | Var | 1:15 Retailer Incentive Locker Variant Cover | Michelle Wong | 4 | Var | 1:25 Retailer Incentive Movie Variant Cover | Natacha Bustos (a) & Dylan Todd (d) | 5 | Var | Unlocked Paper Doll Sketch Cover | Audrey Mok | 6 | RE | Hyperforce Variant Cover | Joana Lafuente | 7 | 2nd | Second Printing Cover | Dan Mora | 2 | *Notes:* The 1:25 Retailer Incentive Movie Variant Cover is a homage of the movie poster for Ferris Bueller's Day Off.
